Release Notes:

This is '2 on 1' set showcases Faron's recordings from a time
when he was at the very height of his career, where his
individual trademark temulous tenor vocals were never better.
This CD is comprised of two first rate albums: 'Here's Faron
Young' from 1968 and 'Occasional Wife' from 1970. Both albums
have now been digitally re-mastered and are reissued here
together on CD for the first time.
